禮君臣，¶
正上下，¶

就藪澤，¶
處間曠，¶
釣魚閒處，¶	KR2b0017_074:1b:8:2:1,KR2c0021_112:67a:5:19:2,KR3j0015_001:7a:4:3:5,KR3k0003_036:1b:5:3:1,KR3k0012_501:6b:11:5:6,KR3k0012_999:6b:11:5:12038,KR3k0025_083:1b:1:10:2,KR3k0045_016:3b:3:5:2,KR3k0055_294:2b:3:9:4,KR3k0058_093:2a:1:34:2,KR4h0106_023:20b:8:5:8,KR4h0145_008:29a:5:36:75,KR4h0145_009:47b:6:19:121,KR4h0145_021:14a:6:31:26,KR4h0145_027:15a:2:28:31,KR4h0145_027:52b:7:7:114,KR5c0126_015:1a:24:1:2,KR5c0138_006:1b:1:5:1,KR5h0057_004:030a:9:8:33,KR5i0036_003:03p083a:8:26:20
無為而已矣；¶	KR1d0057_148:19a:5:12:0,KR1h0019_003:34b:8:19:158,KR2b0017_074:1b:8:6:1,KR2c0021_112:67a:6:2:2,KR3a0034_003:8b:8:2:1,KR3a0078_010:43a:5:17:6,KR3h0063_069:96b:1:8:1502,KR3j0015_001:7a:4:7:5,KR3k0003_036:1b:5:7:1,KR3k0012_501:6b:11:9:6,KR3k0012_999:6b:11:9:12038,KR3k0025_083:1b:1:14:2,KR3k0045_016:3b:3:9:2,KR3k0055_294:2b:3:13:4,KR3k0058_093:2a:2:13:2,KR3l0062_023:33a:5:8:1,KR4c0015_002:39a:2:40:54,KR4d0109_041:8b:4:14:4,KR4h0106_023:20b:8:9:8,KR4h0139_076:35b:7:2:14,KR4h0145_008:29a:5:40:75,KR4h0145_009:47b:6:23:121,KR4h0145_021:14a:6:35:26,KR4h0145_027:15a:2:32:31,KR4h0145_027:52b:7:11:114,KR5c0126_015:1a:25:1:2,KR5c0138_006:1b:1:9:1

# dating: 8110

無物累，¶
無人非，¶
無鬼責。¶

不思慮，¶
不豫謀。¶
光矣而不耀，¶	KR1j0076_014:6b:3:28:6,KR2c0021_112:68a:2:5:2,KR4d0159_033:12a:6:16:28,KR4h0106_023:21b:4:12:8,KR5c0051_005:3b:3:10:4,KR5c0063_001:009a:10:10:4,KR5c0063_002:010b:1:11:7,KR5c0064_001:023a:8:13:5,KR5c0064_001:024a:2:16:5,KR5c0064_004:024a:3:14:9,KR5c0079_002:003b:9:14:2,KR5c0079_002:004b:6:5:2,KR5c0079_006:016a:4:15:5,KR5c0079_006:016b:1:13:5,KR5c0080_001:008b:3:15:5,KR5c0092_001:007b:5:1:39,KR5c0095_002:003b:4:13:5,KR5c0107_004:022b:1:13:7,KR5c0113_009:008b:1:16:3,KR5c0113_009:023b:7:12:3,KR5c0126_015:2a:32:1:8,KR5c0127_046:005a:3:5:13,KR5c0128_017:003a:2:16:2,KR5c0135_028:002a:8:12:5,KR5c0136_009:003a:9:10:4,KR5c0138_006:2b:5:26:1,KR5c0139_017:008b:1:1:11,KR5d0055_065:003b:5:4:5,KR5h0057_004:031b:6:5:35,KR5i0036_003:03p084a:4:14:20,KR5i0056_003:03p014a:4:17:68,KR6q0165_002:0010a:22:20:28

乃合天德。	KR5a0103_000:010a:9:12:1,KR5c0051_005:3b:6:9:4,KR5c0067_002:005a:9:2:6,KR5c0126_015:2a:39:1:8,KR5c0127_046:005a:5:1:13,KR5c0127_046:008b:8:4:13,KR5c0128_017:003a:4:12:2,KR5c0135_028:002a:10:8:5,KR5c0136_009:003b:1:6:5,KR5c0138_006:2b:8:2:1,KR5c0139_017:009a:10:5:11,KR5h0057_004:031b:8:2:35,KR5i0036_003:03p084a:6:7:20,KR5i0056_003:03p014a:5:11:68,KR6q0219_002:0041a:21:13:217,KR6q0219_002:0041a:27:9:222

# src: ZHUANG 15.2.5 Guo Qingfan 542; Wang Shumin 560; Fang Yong 411; Chen Guying 396
# dating: 8110
<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_015-3a>¶
故曰：¶
悲樂者，¶
德之邪；¶
喜怒者，¶
道之過；¶
好惡者，¶
德之失。¶

# src: ZHUANG 15.2.6 Guo Qingfan 542; Wang Shumin 560; Fang Yong 411; Chen Guying 396
# dating: 8110
故心不憂樂，¶	KR2c0021_112:68a:4:17:2,KR3j0010_001:15b:4:8:2,KR3k0045_113:17a:2:13:4,KR3k0046_094:11b:4:2:2,KR4d0102_003:27a:5:16:11,KR4h0106_023:21b:7:3:8,KR5c0051_005:3b:8:12:4,KR5c0122_005:001a:6:7:3,KR5c0126_015:3a:8:1:10,KR5c0127_046:005a:6:8:13,KR5c0128_017:003b:5:4:2,KR5c0135_028:002b:1:15:6,KR5c0136_009:004a:9:1:5,KR5c0138_006:3a:1:10:1,KR5c0139_017:010a:2:1:12,KR5f0018_002:007a:3:14:8,KR5h0057_004:031b:9:9:35,KR5i0036_003:03p084a:7:8:20

故曰：¶
形勞而不休則弊，¶	KR2c0021_112:68a:6:18:2,KR3j0178_002:9b:7:28:3,KR3k0025_041:22a:3:17:15,KR4h0106_023:22a:1:4:8,KR5a0090_001:004a:1:8:1,KR5c0051_005:4a:5:3:4,KR5c0067_005:016a:4:13:20,KR5c0079_010:031a:3:14:9,KR5c0126_015:3a:19:1:10,KR5c0127_046:010a:6:3:25,KR5c0128_017:004a:5:3:2,KR5c0135_028:002b:3:16:6,KR5c0136_009:004b:1:10:6,KR5c0138_006:3a:4:21:1,KR5c0139_017:011a:3:3:13,KR5g0071_002:009b:5:11:13,KR5h0057_004:033a:4:3:36,KR5i0036_003:03p084b:1:19:20
精用而不已則勞，¶	KR2c0021_112:68a:7:4:2,KR3j0178_002:9b:8:6:3,KR3k0025_041:22a:4:2:15,KR4h0106_023:22a:1:11:8,KR5a0090_001:004a:1:15:1,KR5c0051_005:4a:5:10:4,KR5c0079_010:031a:6:8:9,KR5c0126_015:3a:20:1:10,KR5c0127_046:010a:6:10:25,KR5c0128_017:004a:5:10:2,KR5c0135_028:002b:4:6:6,KR5c0136_009:004b:1:17:6,KR5c0138_006:3a:5:2:1,KR5c0139_017:011a:3:10:13,KR5g0071_002:009b:5:18:13,KR5h0057_004:033a:4:10:36,KR5i0036_003:03p084b:1:26:20
勞則竭。

# src: ZHUANG 15.2.7 Guo Qingfan 544; Wang Shumin 560; Fang Yong 411; (Chen Guying 396)
# dating: 8110
<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_015-4a>¶
水之性，¶
不雜則清，¶	KR1a0144_005:12b:8:5:1,KR1d0057_096:26b:1:6:0,KR1h0012_009:1b:8:13:7,KR2b0017_074:2a:8:2:1,KR2c0021_112:68a:7:17:2,KR3k0011_007:12b:2:18:4,KR3k0011_007:12b:3:1:4,KR3k0012_058:4b:8:6:5,KR3k0012_999:4b:8:6:6095,KR3k0025_001:16a:6:16:8,KR3k0045_112:1b:3:4:2,KR3k0050_030:27a:7:25:11,KR3k0050_030:27a:8:9:11,KR3k0058_010:4a:2:6:2,KR4e0203_003:11b:6:7:6,KR4h0106_023:22a:2:3:8,KR5c0051_005:4a:6:10:4,KR5c0081_001:009a:2:4:8,KR5c0126_015:4a:2:1:11,KR5c0127_046:010a:7:6:25,KR5c0127_046:013b:5:1:25,KR5c0128_017:004a:6:6:2,KR5c0128_017:004b:4:10:2,KR5c0135_028:002b:5:2:6,KR5c0136_009:004b:2:13:6,KR5c0138_006:3a:5:23:1,KR5c0139_017:011a:9:4:13,KR5d0039_007:014b:2:2:19,KR5h0057_004:033a:5:6:36,KR5i0036_003:03p084b:2:8:20,KR6q0219_002:0041b:2:13:226

故曰：¶

# src: ZHUANG 15.2.9 Guo Qingfan 546; Wang Shumin 560; Fang Yong 412; (Chen Guying 396)
# dating: 8110
<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_015-5a>¶

# src: ZHUANG 15.2.10 Guo Qingfan 546; Wang Shumin 560; Fang Yong 412; (Chen Guying 396)
# dating: 8110
故素也者，¶	KR2c0021_112:68b:6:14:2,KR4h0106_023:22a:8:21:8,KR5c0051_005:5a:5:1:4,KR5c0067_002:005a:10:9:6,KR5c0104_004:012a:1:14:1,KR5c0126_015:5a:12:1:14,KR5c0127_046:010b:5:14:25,KR5c0128_017:006a:1:5:2,KR5c0135_028:003a:3:10:6,KR5c0136_009:006a:4:1:7,KR5c0138_006:3b:8:24:1,KR5c0139_017:015a:6:1:17,KR5h0057_004:033b:3:14:37,KR5i0036_003:03p085a:1:43:20,KR5i0056_003:03p013b:9:10:66
謂其無所與雜也；¶	KR2b0017_074:2b:4:12:1,KR2c0021_112:68b:6:18:2,KR4h0106_023:22b:1:4:8,KR5c0051_005:5a:5:5:4,KR5c0067_002:005a:10:13:6,KR5c0079_005:007b:5:9:3,KR5c0104_004:012a:2:2:1,KR5c0126_015:5a:13:1:14,KR5c0127_046:010b:6:1:25,KR5c0128_017:006a:1:9:2,KR5c0135_028:003a:3:14:6,KR5c0136_009:006a:4:5:7,KR5c0138_006:3b:8:28:1,KR5c0139_017:015a:6:5:17,KR5h0057_004:033b:4:1:37,KR5i0036_003:03p085a:2:4:20
純也者，¶
謂其不虧其神也。¶	KR2b0017_074:2b:5:1:1,KR2c0021_112:68b:7:7:2,KR4d0109_048:10b:1:20:1,KR4d0109_060:9b:3:10:1,KR4h0002_047:36a:5:9:27,KR4h0003_047:42a:9:18:16,KR4h0106_023:22b:1:14:8,KR5c0051_005:5a:6:1:4,KR5c0067_002:005b:1:7:6,KR5c0104_004:012a:2:12:1,KR5c0121_002:8b:3:17:0,KR5c0122_002:006b:8:8:3,KR5c0123_004:024a:2:10:11,KR5c0126_015:5a:15:1:14,KR5c0127_046:010b:6:11:25,KR5c0128_017:006a:2:2:2,KR5c0135_028:003a:4:7:6,KR5c0136_009:006a:4:15:7,KR5c0138_006:4a:1:6:1,KR5c0139_017:015a:6:15:17,KR5h0057_004:033b:4:11:37,KR5i0036_003:03p085a:2:14:20
能體純素，¶	KR2b0017_074:2b:5:8:1,KR2c0021_112:68b:7:14:2,KR3j0018_001:24b:3:14:2,KR4d0007_003:22b:3:4:0,KR4d0007_005:8a:6:18:0,KR4d0007_005:12b:5:12:0,KR4d0007_005:24a:8:3:0,KR4d0007_007:26b:8:13:0,KR4d0569_018:13b:8:15:40,KR4e0109_008:11a:1:17:16,KR4h0002_047:36a:5:16:27,KR4h0003_047:42a:9:25:16,KR4h0106_023:22b:1:21:8,KR5a0090_002:015a:5:1:1,KR5a0090_004:015b:4:10:1,KR5a0092_001:024a:1:14:2,KR5c0067_002:005b:1:14:6,KR5c0104_004:012a:3:3:1,KR5c0105_001:022a:10:13:5,KR5c0126_015:5a:16:1:14,KR5c0127_046:010b:7:1:25,KR5c0127_046:015a:6:11:35,KR5c0127_046:016a:3:12:36,KR5c0128_017:006a:2:9:2,KR5c0135_028:003a:4:14:6,KR5c0136_009:006a:5:5:7,KR5c0138_006:4a:3:11:1,KR5c0139_017:015b:8:1:18,KR5h0057_004:033b:5:1:37,KR5i0036_003:03p085a:2:21:20,KR5i0036_003:03p085a:3:21:20,KR5i0036_003:03p086b:7:1:20,KR6q0219_002:0041b:5:9:228
謂之真人。	KR2a0003_020:17a:8:13:1,KR2c0021_112:68b:7:18:2,KR2k0049_228:51a:5:18:1,KR3j0008_001:19a:8:5:19,KR3j0008_001:19b:6:2:19,KR3j0010_014:1b:3:18:2,KR3j0018_001:24b:3:18:2,KR3j0185_112:35a:7:16:6,KR3k0012_660:1a:5:22:4,KR3k0012_999:1a:5:22:13412,KR3k0046_035:56b:2:21:2,KR3k0046_100:33a:7:1:2,KR3k0056_004:9a:3:32:2,KR3l0055_005:4b:1:18:3,KR4c0067_033:1b:6:2:5,KR4d0007_003:22b:3:8:0,KR4d0007_005:8a:7:1:0,KR4d0156_013:9a:8:15:10,KR4h0002_004:13a:7:8:3,KR4h0002_013:24a:6:6:20,KR4h0002_047:36a:5:20:27,KR4h0003_004:13b:3:51:2,KR4h0003_013:25a:3:14:25,KR4h0022_746:18a:8:21:15,KR4h0106_023:22b:2:4:8,KR4h0145_029:45b:8:32:108,KR5a0239_000:009a:2:11:0,KR5a0239_000:014a:1:8:0,KR5a0239_000:015a:5:14:0,KR5b0235_000:017b:9:2:10,KR5b0277_000:011a:3:9:1,KR5c0118_001:4a:6:1:1,KR5c0126_015:5a:17:1:14,KR5c0138_006:4a:3:15:1,KR5d0039_003:011a:1:2:6,KR5e0012_006:005b:7:8:8,KR5e0012_006:006a:2:2:8,KR6q0219_002:0041b:5:13:228,KR6q0386_045:0773b:10:12:28,KR6q0386_045:0775c:10:16:85,KR6s0059_007:0980a:20:3:70,KR6s0059_009:0988c:7:17:138,KR6s0075_004:0430b:11:3:7
